entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
